name: 李旻璁
objective: The course introduces the basic concepts of mass transfer and diffusion, and the common unit operation in chemical engineering.
schedule:
Introduction (1 wk)
Mass transfer: basic concepts and the theories (2 wks)
Distillation (4 wks)
Introduce Aspen Plus Software (1wk)
Distillation in Aspen Plus (4 wks)
Other unit operations in chemical engineering (2 wks)
Unit operations in Aspen Plus (2 wks)
Diffusion (1 wk)
scorePolicy:
Final exam 100%
Class anticipation -- minus 10 points per absence
materials: Diffusion, Mass Transfer in Fluid Systems, 3rd Edition, by E.L. Cussler
